description:
Ski track at 5pm, meeting friends at 8pm? This sweater uses a merino wool blend and an insulated front panel to add welcome warmth. A fantastic mid-layer when you're active, and it looks presentable once you move indoors.

  • Merino wool, acrylic blend is warm and durable
  • Quilted front insulation protects your core
  • High collar has a YKK ® zip for letting heat out and stopping cold drafts getting in
  • Thumb loops provide comfort and added warmth
name: B Daehlie Half Zip Comfy Sweater - Men's
